metadata.title: CVE-2016-5834 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the wp_get_attachment_linkfunction in wp-includes/post-template.php in WordPress before 4.5.3 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a craftedattachment name, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-5833.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5834` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.3+dfsg-1').
